titles.title: Combating Deceptive Immigration Enforcement Practices Act of 2022
Combating Deceptive Immigration Enforcement Practices Act of 2022

A bill to amend section 287 of the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit immigration officers and agents of the Department of Homeland Security from wearing clothing or other items bearing the word "police".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Combating Deceptive Immigration Enforcement Practices Act of 2022
This bill bars immigration officers or agents of the Department of Homeland Security from wearing clothing, accessories, or other items bearing the word police while performing duties under the immigration laws.
